column4: Hi, is there a way to change file associations in GNOME 2.30 ?
they are called mimetypes I believe. Check into how to change those
That's exactly what I did. I have edited /usr/share/applications/mimeinfo.cache and done various .desktop file wizardry. It still doesn't work at all
well, that is the extent of my knowledge of gnome. In xfce I just change it in the file's properties
